name: Cyber City VR
description: Cyber City Is A Fun New Multiplayer Social Experience where you can meet new friends and talk about life while fighting back against robots that have taken over. Use your backpack to store ammo and other items, take it with you or leave it and come back latter. 😊 Can you destroy all the robots without getting killed? (even the flying ones) I hope you like this work and please leave honest comments or message me at your favorite social. Patreon support is always welcome as well to further improve the game faster and get new V-tube videos when I drop them. WELCOME to CYBER CITY!!!
